title: Penguins notebook: Top-line winger could be a revolving door
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Penguins - Today 
David Perron and Pascal Dupuis each got a shot to play on the top line Wednesday night with Sidney Crosby and Phil Kessel against Detroit...
